img_summary: The image depicts a dark, atmospheric outdoor scene from a video game, featuring a stone platform with two wooden chests placed on it. The chests are highlighted with red circular markers, indicating their significance or interactivity in the game. The background includes leafless trees and stone structures, contributing to a somber and mysterious ambiance.
